title: Need ID from Wine Bottle label
content:
Looking for some inspiration for a new Wine Label and I need this typeface! I'm looking for the top two lines. Can someone help me!?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821125552im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%20(2)_3684.JPG)
author: kimdumo

comments.content:
Alter Littera has some Beautiful blackletter fonts:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/103269](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821125552/http:/typophile.com/node/103269 "http://typophile.com/node/103269")

I agree, & I highly recommend Alter Littera's Wilhelm Klingspor Schrift for a really stylish wine label.  
Don
